entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Three Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Three Hills 10:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -24.6°C
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -28.1°C
Wind: ESE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning near noon. Local blowing snow. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
